purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of planned or actual outputs from an activity or a task. Examples of work output include products, certificates and records of measurements taken.

ul.li: definition and quantification of work output;
relationships between the work output statement and detailed descriptions of the work output item such as a product or serialized item;
classification of work output and work output relationships. such as the relationship between the planned and the actual work output.

purpose.p: The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:

ul.li: property, date and descriptive representation assignment;

inscope.li: the definition and quantification of planned as well as recorded work outputs;
the relationships between the work output and detailed descriptions of the output.

outscope.li: the detailed description of the work output;
the description of the activity or task that delivers or produces the output;

aa.refpath_extend: classification_item classification_item *> work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item = action_method
classification_item classification_item *> work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item = action_method_assignment
classification_item classification_item *> work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item work_output_classification_item = action_method_relationship

action_method action_method <- action_method_assignment.assigned_action_method action_method_assignment {action_method_assignment.role -> action_method_role action_method_role action_method_role.name = 'work output'} action_method_assignment => applied_action_method_assignment applied_action_method_assignment applied_action_method_assignment.items[i] -> action_method_items
action_method_assignment action_method_assignment => applied_action_method_assignment applied_action_method_assignment applied_action_method_assignment.items[i] -> action_method_items
